LanguageData.STR_Stirfrymeal.label: Cook four strange stir-fried meals
LanguageData.STR_Stirfrymeal.description:
Cooks a stir-fried meal from a combination of strange meat and raw plant ingredients. 

Makes enough for 4 meals. 

Food Effects: Manipulation and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.STR_Cookstewpot.label: Cook eight pots of strange stew
LanguageData.STR_Cookstewpot.description:
Slow cooks a pot of stew from a combination of strange meat and raw plant ingredients. 

Makes enough for 8 meals. 

Food Effects: Consciousness, Metabolism, Blood Filtration, and Blood Pumping.
LanguageData.STR_CookTacos.label: Cook five strange tacos
LanguageData.STR_CookTacos.description:
strange meat and Cheese in a corn shell. Requires strange meat, cheese, and cornmeal to make. 

 Makes 5 servings. 

Food Effects: Manipulation and Metabolism.
LanguageData.STR_SaltMeat.label: Salt ten strange meats
LanguageData.STR_SaltMeat.description: Preserve strange meats in salt to prevent spoiling.
LanguageData.STR_GrillKabob.label: Grill two strange kabobs
LanguageData.STR_GrillKabob.description: strange meats and vegetables skewered on a stick and grilled to perfection.
LanguageData.STR_Grillsteak.label: Grill two strange steaks
LanguageData.STR_Grillsteak.description: strange meat that has been cooked over a grill. //nMakes 2 strange Steaks.
LanguageData.STR_Bakepizza.label: Bake three strange pizzas
LanguageData.STR_Bakepizza.description:
Bake strange pizza. 

Makes 3 servings. 

Food Effects: Consciousness and Metabolism.
LanguageData.STR_BakeMeatPie.label: Bake two strange meat pies
LanguageData.STR_BakeMeatPie.description: Bake a tasty strange pie. \n\nMakes 2 pies.
LanguageData.STR_Cookgrilledsandwich.label: Cook two strange cheeseburgers
LanguageData.STR_Cookgrilledsandwich.description:
A sandwich made of bread, strange meat, and cheese. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.STR_MakeStrangePemmican.label: Make strange pemmican
LanguageData.STR_MakeStrangePemmican.description: Make strange pemmican, a preserved combination of strange meat and organic food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
LanguageData.STR_MakeStrangePemmicanCampfire.label: Make strange pemmican
LanguageData.STR_MakeStrangePemmicanCampfire.descript: Make strange pemmican, a preserved combination of strange meat and organic food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
LanguageData.STR_CookStrangeMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival strange meal
LanguageData.STR_CookStrangeMealSurvival.description: Cooks a packaged survival strange meal from a combination of strange meat and organic ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
